function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Zoonotic disease outbreaks from animal origins","Impact":"Potential rise in zoonotic diseases leading to global health crises","Mitigation":"Prohibiting markets that sell meat and products from wild animals, and enforcing regulations for animal trade","Technologies":"Monitoring and surveillance systems for animal markets, advanced testing and screening techniques","People":"General public, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Link between zoonotic diseases and climate change & land usage","Impact":"Increased stress on wildlife leading to a rise in zoonotic diseases","Mitigation":"Sustainable land-use practices, conservation efforts, and climate change mitigation","Technologies":"Remote sensing, GIS mapping, conservation biology","People":"Wildlife conservationists, environmental organizations, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Close proximity of human, domestic, and wild animal habitats leading to virus mixing and propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of novel virus mixing and further spread","Mitigation":"Improved urban planning, zoning regulations, and habitat conservation","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, urban planning software, habitat restoration techniques","People":"Urban planners, wildlife experts, policymakers","Owner":"City authorities, urban planning agencies"}]}
